chiththa abha nthara ayahapath ෙperanawalin sitha mudawima ෙmahi paramarthayayi.ෙkelas washeyan dakewanuey ෙm abha nthara ෙperanamaya.ayahapath abha nthara ෙperanawalinnidahaswiya haki kamewda padhana chinthanaya mangin siduew.ෙm widarshana chinthanaya bududahamata pamanakmasuwiesheshiwuwaki.samatha chinthanaya osese ෙpala gaswu samatha bhawanakama buduhimiyan pahalawimata ෙparapawa bharathey upeyogi karaganimin shawakayaeg manese sanjanana hakiyawa wadidiyunu karanu laeb.asu wachana mangin nirikshana shakthiya athikara sihiya ෙyodawa shariraya ha manasathula aramunu ganiemdi siduwana abha nthara kiyakarithwaya awebodha karaganima ෙmahi padhana ෙw.eethulin ෙmethak kalak labunu indiya sanjananaya sampurna niwaradi awebodhayak ෙnowana bawawataha gani.aramunu niwaradiwa gahanaya karaganimata asamathwanuey sihiya ha nirikshanaya eeta adalakiya shakthieyan ෙnopawathi nisabawa ෙmahidi watehe.shawakaya budun wahaneseeg wachana ෙkerahipamanakma wishwasaya ෙnothabana athara wishwasayata padanama wanuey swayan patha kshayayi.ebawin bududahama wishwasaya huedak andharanukaraneyan thibima anumatha ෙnokarayi.bududahem wishwasaya swayanpatha kshaya pamanekota atha.ee nisa suthedshana asu pamaninma eya adhanagahi ෙlasa wishwasenokara eewa satha dayi wimasabala wichara purwakawa awebodha karaganna ෙman dakwa thieb.dharmayapahurakata upamakara athi bawath,thanhaew upadanayaneg niruddhiya in aෙpkshitha bawath dakwaatha.dharmaya iwahalkaregana thanha,mana,drushti ha upadana athikara ෙnogatha yuthubawa dakwimadawadagathya.yamak awichara purwakawa adhana gahiwa piliganima nisa thanha,mana,drushti athiew.dharmayekenaku piligatha yutheth eya swayan patha ksha simawathula pihita bawin ee pilibandawa thanha,mana,drushti athikara ganimata idak ෙnolaeb.sabawinma thanha,mana,drushti abha ntharawa athiwiyahakiayahapath ෙperana bihiwimata ෙhethuwaki.niwan awebodhaya nam ee siyalelan midimayi.dharmaya padanamkaregana atheth niwan awebodhaya bawin eki niwan awebodhayata awahira karana dharmatha eyataathi manga wiya ෙnohakiya.enisa suthedshanawanhi paramarthaya shawakaya thanha,mana,drushti walinhakithak eෙthara karawimayi.budun wahaneseeg mulma sutha ෙdshanawa ෙlasa salekana dhammachakkapawaththana sutha ෙdshana pilibandawa wimasa balieman wuwada ෙmaki karunu nirikshanaya kala haka.ehidipalamu warata dwianthawadi chinthanakamawalin wiyukthawima
